properties.entry: SELECT CATEGORY_CODE, CONTENT, IDX FROM AI_SCRIPT ORDER BY CATEGORY_CODE ASC;
INSERT AI_SCRIPT (CATEGORY_CODE, CONTENT) Values (?,?)
UPDATE AI_SCRIPT SET CONTENT = ? WHERE IDX = ?
DELETE FROM AI_SCRIPT WHERE IDX = ?;
UPDATE CATEGORY_AI SET CATEGORY_CODE =?,CATEGORY_NAME= ? WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = ?
DELETE FROM CATEGORY_AI WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = ?;
INSERT CATEGORY_AI (CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME) Values (?, ?)

SELECT BUCKET.CATEGORY_CODE, BUCKET.NICKNAME, BUCKET.PHONE, BUCKET.CONTENT, BUCKET.IMAGE_URL, BUCKET.CREATE_DT, BUCKET.IDX, CATEGORY_BUCKET.CATEGORY_NAME, BUCKET.HIDDEN FROM BUCKET, CATEGORY_BUCKET WHERE BUCKET.CATEGORY_CODE = CATEGORY_BUCKET.CATEGORY_CODE ORDER BY IDX DESC;
INSERT BUCKET (CATEGORY_CODE, NICKNAME, PHONE, CONTENT,IMAGE_URL, CREATE_DT, HIDDEN) Values (?, ?, ?, ? ,? ,?,? )
DELETE FROM BUCKET WHERE IDX = ?;
UPDATE BUCKET SET CREATE_DT = ?, CONTENT = ? WHERE IDX = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY_BUCKET;
INSERT CATEGORY_BUCKET (CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME) Values (?, ?)
DELETE FROM CATEGORY_BUCKET WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = ?;

SELECT BUCKET.CATEGORY_CODE, BUCKET.NICKNAME, BUCKET.PHONE, BUCKET.CONTENT, BUCKET.IMAGE_URL, BUCKET.CREATE_DT, BUCKET.IDX, CATEGORY_BUCKET.CATEGORY_NAME, BUCKET.HIDDEN FROM BUCKET, CATEGORY_BUCKET WHERE BUCKET.CATEGORY_CODE = CATEGORY_BUCKET.CATEGORY_CODE ORDER BY IDX DESC;
SELECT VERSION_CODE, UPDATE_CONTENT FROM UPDATE_APP ORDER BY VERSION_CODE DESC LIMIT 10;
INSERT UPDATE_APP ( UPDATE_CONTENT ) Values ( ? )
DELETE FROM UPDATE_APP WHERE VERSION_CODE = ? ;
SELECT VERSION_CODE, VERSION_NAME, UPDATE_FORCE FROM VERSION ORDER BY VERSION_CODE DESC LIMIT 10;
INSERT VERSION (VERSION_CODE, VERSION_NAME, UPDATE_FORCE) Values (?, ?, ?)
UPDATE VERSION SET VERSION_CODE = ? , VERSION_NAME = ?, UPDATE_FORCE= ? WHERE VERSION_CODE = ?
DELETE FROM VERSION WHERE VERSION_CODE = ?
SELECT VERSION_CODE, VERSION_NAME FROM IP;
INSERT IP (VERSION_CODE, VERSION_NAME) Values (?, ? )
DELETE FROM IP WHERE VERSION_CODE = ?;
SELECT DAYOFWEEK(DATE), DATE, IDX FROM TODAY_CNT ORDER BY DATE DESC;
SELECT NICKNAME, VERSION_NAME, LAST_DT FROM USER_MOBILE ORDER BY LAST_DT DESC;
SELECT CATEGORY_CODE, CONTENT, IDX, BEST_CNT, GOOD_CNT, SOSO_CNT FROM BUCKET_RANK ORDER BY IDX DESC;
INSERT BUCKET_RANK_USER (BUCKET_RANK_IDX, NICKNAME, COMMENT ) Values (?, ?,? )
SELECT NICKNAME, VERSION_NAME, COUNTRY, LAST_DT,GCM_TOKEN,PHONE, OS_VERSION, TEL_GBN, VISITS FROM USER_MOBILE ORDER BY LAST_DT DESC;
SELECT GCM_TOKEN FROM USER_MOBILE WHERE GCM_TOKEN != "N" ORDER BY LAST_DT DESC;
INSERT USER_MOBILE (OS, NICKNAME, PHONE, VERSION_NAME, MARKET, LANG, COUNTRY, LAST_DT,GCM_TOKEN, OS_VERSION, TEL_GBN, VISITS) Values (?, ?, ?, ? ,? ,?, ?, ?,?, ? ,?, ? )
UPDATE BUCKET SET IMAGE_URL = ? WHERE IDX = ?
DELETE FROM USER_MOBILE WHERE NICKNAME = ?;
SELECT VERSION_CODE, UPDATE_CONTENT FROM UPDATE_APP ORDER BY VERSION_CODE DESC LIMIT 15;
SELECT CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY_BUCKET ORDER BY CATEGORY_CODE ASC;
INSERT COMMENT (NICKNAME, CONTENT,CREATE_DT, BUCKET_NO) Values (?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM VERSION;
SELECT * FROM IP;
INSERT DB_HISTORY (NICKNAME, DB_NAME, CREATE_DT) Values (?, ?, ?)
INSERT CHAT_HISTORY (CHAT_IDX, NICKNAME,CREATE_DT, STATUS) Values (?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE CHAT_HISTORY SET NICKNAME = ?,CREATE_DT = ? , STATUS = ? WHERE CHAT_IDX = ? AND NICKNAME = ?
INSERT CHAT (CHAT_IDX, NICKNAME, CREATE_DT, CONTENT) Values (?, ?, ?, ?)
